Package models

Class AppointmentRequest

java.lang.Object
models.AppointmentRequest
public class AppointmentRequest extends Object
Represents an appointment request in the healthcare system. This class contains information about a patient's request for an appointment with a doctor, including the request ID, patient ID, doctor ID, requested date, time slot, and the status of the request.

  • Constructor Details

    • AppointmentRequest

      public AppointmentRequest(String requestId, String patientId, String doctorId, LocalDate requestedDate, LocalTime requestedTimeSlot, String status)
      Constructs a new AppointmentRequest with the specified details.
      Parameters:
      requestId - The unique identifier for the appointment request.
      patientId - The ID of the patient making the request.
      doctorId - The ID of the doctor for whom the appointment is requested.
      requestedDate - The date for which the appointment is requested.
      requestedTimeSlot - The time slot for the requested appointment.
      status - The current status of the appointment request (Pending, Accepted, Declined).
